TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(object sender, SourceChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SourceChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SourceChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SourceChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SourceChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type SourceChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SourceChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 引发事件以及事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将对特定侦听器元素处理“SourceChanged”事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托表示处理程序的 "SourceChanged" 事件不会作为公共[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件公开，这与大多数路由事件的情况相同。The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events. 相反，"SourceChanged" 是一个路由事件，该事件将保持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]对基础结构的专用，并直接路由。Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed. 由于它是直接路由的`sender` ，而事件数据中的始终是相同的对象。Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the in the event data are always the same object. 你可以通过使用公共方法和来添加和移除此事件的处理程序，尽管事件本身具有专用访问级别。You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods and . 事件的将是的派生类。 `sender`The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of .
